mapper.select: SELECT T1.tokenkey ,T1.token ,T1.customerKey ,T1.image1 ,T1.image2 ,T1.image3 ,T1.productEtc ,T1.groupId ,T1.productCode ,T4.productName ,T1.createUserId ,T2.userName As createUserName ,T1.updateUserId ,T3.userName As updateUserName ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.createDateTime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as createDateTime ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.updateDateTime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as updateDateTime ,T1.activeYn FROM sbToken T1 Left Join ofUser T2 On T1.createUserId=T2.userId Left Join ofUser T3 On T1.updateUserId=T3.userId Left Join sbProductMaster T4 On T1.productCode=T4.idx WHERE T1.customerKey = #{customerKey} ORDER BY createDateTime desc LIMIT ${page_limit_val1} , ${page_limit_val2}

SELECT count(*) AS TOT_COUNT FROM sbToken T1 Left Join ofUser T2 On T1.createUserId=T2.userId Left Join ofUser T3 On T1.updateUserId=T3.userId Left Join sbProductMaster T4 On T1.productCode=T4.idx WHERE T1.customerKey = #{customerKey}

SELECT T1.tokenkey ,T1.token ,T1.customerKey ,T1.image1 ,T1.image2 ,T1.image3 ,T1.productEtc ,T1.groupId ,T1.productCode ,T1.createUserId ,T2.userName As createUserName ,T1.updateUserId ,T3.userName As updateUserName ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.createDateTime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as createDateTime ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.updateDateTime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as updateDateTime ,T1.activeYn FROM sbToken T1 Left Join ofUser T2 On T1.createUserId=T2.userId Left Join ofUser T3 On T1.updateUserId=T3.userId Where T1.tokenkey = #{tokenkey}
